abstract: 3M received 52 percent of Cogent’s shares in its tender offer for the fingerprint identification company, despite opposition from some shareholders who thought 3M should make a higher bid than $10.50 a share.
snippet: 3M received 52 percent of Cogent’s shares in its tender offer for the fingerprint identification company, despite opposition from some shareholders who thought 3M should make a higher bid than $10.50 a share.
lead_paragraph: The 3M Company said on Friday that it had received 52 percent of Cogent‘s shares in its tender offer for the fingerprint identification company, despite opposition from some shareholders who thought 3M should make a higher bid than $10.50 a share.
